com.punchline.javalib.entities

Class ComponentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchline.javalib.entities.ComponentManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Entity

    public abstract class ComponentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds a map of Components with their type identifiers, and helpful methods for accessing and manipulating them.
    Author:
    Nathaniel + William
